name: BubbleStarParty
description:
The Planet Party is on!3D world multiplayer bubble battle!

This is an online multiplayer 3D world with bubble battles. Not only can you unlock more than 30 characters with various skills, but there is also a level editor with hundreds of custom modules, allowing you to create your own levels, allowing other players to cooperate and fight together in your level!

Built-in level editor

The game currently contains more than 500 different terrain modules, dozens of obstacles, props!And a variety of functional modules!Let you make a variety of interesting levels, let other players in your level joy online!


More DIY modules will be added gradually, and even monsters, NPCS and other modules that can create multiplayer PVE stories will be added

Bubble battle in 3D world, multiple match modes


The core battle mode is to use bubbles or skills against each other, currently there are 4 different match modes, will be gradually increased!
1. Star Soaking Tournament: Win by defeating all enemies (Chicken Mode)
2. Go forward: Dodge all kinds of obstacles and get to the finish line. The team or player who reaches the finish line first wins!Players can make their own parkour maps and play with other players!
3. Fruit Wars: Players scramble to get the most fruit on the map. The player who gets the most wins.
4. Star time trial: Beat other players as much as possible within the specified time, and the team or player with the highest number of kills wins!
Players can make their own maps in any mode and play online with other players!

Character selection with different skills

There are currently over 30 different characters to unlock, each with their own active and passive skills

Different kinds of bubbles

You can unlock different bubble combination characters for parties!
It is currently in beta. According to the plan, more modes, characters and DIY content will be added in the future. I hope players can give various suggestions to build this game together, make it more interesting and make more self-made gameplay!
